dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put the phone away...ok you guys, today's lesson is about character development. In "The Secret" we talk about the law of attraction and we want to be careful about the people we surround ourselves with because we become the average of those people. So we're going to make a visual board of people who are demonstrating good character, like Angelina Jolie. So what are some qualities you admire about her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marc and Rebecca were bragging about it at a party, they said they had been in Rachel Bilson's house and Lindsay Lohan's. They said they went to Paris Hilton's like eight times...

dialogues.speaker: POLICE STATION
dialogues.text: On a monitor -new surveillance video is side by side with footage from earlier video. They zoom in and freeze on im when they match up identifying some of the figures to be alike. We hear a voice over the phone. TEENAGE GIRL (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Marc Hall, Rebecca Ahn and Chloe, I don't know her last name, and Nicki Moore.

dialogues.speaker: COMPUTER SCREEN
dialogues.text: We see Rebecca's page linking her to Marc as a friend, an the other kids' pages, linking them as friends. We see pa photos of them in Paris Hilton's nightclub room, Nicki an Sam posing in lingerie, a photo of Sam with a Chanel bag. Chloe's page of her in vulgar sexy poses with Ricky, with captions -"Wanna smoke a bluuuunt".

dialogues.text: We hear loud banging, as Marc's mother, in her robe goes the door. DEBBIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One minute... MAN'S VOICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: L.A.P.D. Open the door. She fumbles nervously to open door. She opens the door to big cops in dark uniforms with guns pointed at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marc's lying in his bed, when his mom comes in terrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Blue - 03/16/12              68.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: We hear dogs barking outside. DEBBIE (shaking)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to get dressed, they want you to come outside. Marc knows this is it. He throws his arms around her and breaks down crying like little kid. MARC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom! DEBBIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever it is, we'll figure it out, honey. She holds him, until a cop enters and pulls him aside, we follow them into the living room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Big cops in uniform stand tall, with intimidating dogs by their side. COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you Marc Hall? MARC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes... They handcuff Marc. The dogs bark, Marc's mom cries. Marc holds his head low as they read him his Miranda righ COP                                           *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have the right to remain                            * silent. Anything you say can and                        * will be used against you in a court                     * of law.                                                 * Marc's dad talks to police in tough guy, confrontational MR. HALL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on here, what's this about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Blue - 03/16/12          68A.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, I'm going to have to ask you to step aside. He continues reading Marc his rights. COP (CONT'D)                              *

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have the right to speak to an                   * attorney present during any                         * questioning. If you cannot afford a                 * lawyer, one will be provided for                    * you.                                                *

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: One police officer walks by carrying out pink pumps seale a plastic bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Police search the room, they find designer clothes and accessories under the bed that they bag as evidence.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. MARC'S HOUSE- DAY
dialogues.text: They shove Marc in the back of the police car in the driv of the modest suburban house. His dad has his arm around mom, who watches crying in her robe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE UP: on Marc, feeling like a piece of shit, as the c drives away with him.

dialogues.text: TMZ REPORTER (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suspect Marc Hall, was arrested today in conjunction with the Hollywood Hills burglaries that occurred over the past few months. It is believed that the gang referred to as "the Burglar Bunch'...

dialogues.speaker: INT. NICKI'S HOUSE- DAY
dialogues.text: Cops bang on door. COP (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open up, L.A.P.D. Laurie is hysterical in her Juicy sweat suit as she opens door. Her Yorkie barks.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: A big gold Buddha statue stands near the entrance. LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes? COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this the residence of Nicolette Moore? LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, what is this about? COP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a warrant to search your house. Everyone needs to come outside. The girls yell from upstairs. NICKI (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god, what's going on! Laurie, who looks terrified, tries to remain calm and centered. LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Girls-You need to come downstairs, now. POLICE OFFICER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ma'am, we need you to secure your animals. EMILY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?! Police go into her room to search. EMILY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't understand?! What's happening?! The police bring out a Louis Vuitton suitcase and designe bags and clothing from her room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girls come into the living room. The Yorkie keeps barking. Nicki is wearing the same baby blue Juicy sweat pants as in the surveillance video. They handcuff Nicki and bring her outside.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: POLICE OFFICER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need you all to leave the premises and wait outside.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. NICKI'S HOUSE- DAY
dialogues.text: Suburban neighbors come out to watch as Nicki is told to face the wall, handcuffed. Laurie, and the rest of the family are outside in their r and pajamas. Nicki and Emily are crying. There are 4 police cars, and police officers all around. POLICE OFFICER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have the right to remain silent. He reads the Miranda rights as he puts Nicki under arrest NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want a lawyer! Call my lawyer! They put Nicki in the back of the police car. A neighbor takes a photo with his phone. NICKI (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom! The girls are all crying and freaking out. EMILY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?! Why are they taking her?! Sirens scream as they pull away.

dialogues.speaker: INT. NICKI'S HOUSE- DAY
dialogues.text: Laurie , Emily and Sam in their robes and pajamas come ba in to their livingroom. LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Girls, we need to have a prayer circle right now. We need to center ourselves. Laurie takes their hands and she and Emily, Sam and Henry form a circle holding hands.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: LAURIE (CONT'D) I know that right here and now there is one mind, one presence, and I trust and know that this whole experience right now is strictly for the higher good of each and every outcome, I give thanks and this is the Truth. SAM & EMILY (IN UNISON) And so it is. LAURIE And so it is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Police knock on the door of the well-kept home with a BMW the driveway. Rebecca's mom, a put together middle-aged Korean business woman opens the door. REBECCA'S MOM Hello, how can I help you? POLICE OFFICER Is this the home of Rebecca Ahn? REBECCA'S MOM I'm her mother, but she's staying with her father in Nevada. POLICE OFFICER Ma'am, we'll need to get her current address.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a working class Mexican neighborhood, Rob is led out o his house in handcuffs and put in a police car.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: His small Mexican mother in her house dress watches emotionally with Rob's 12-yr-old and 8-yr-old little sist in pajamas, as they take him away.

dialogues.speaker: EXT. RICKY'S CONDO- DAY
dialogues.text: Ricky looks pissed, being led out of his condo in a kimon robe and socks, way too early in the day for him. Police officers follow with a jackpot of illegal substances, zip locs of large amounts of mushrooms and guns. A pitbull on lawn barks at the cops. RICKY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck, man...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chloe and her parents are at the breakfast table. They si an upper middle-class beige dining room, her mother in cr work out clothes and her father in a suit, reading the pa Chloe texts on her black berry while she eats cereal. Two small white dogs lay at her mother's feet as she drin fruit smoothie. Sirens interrupt the scene, as they appro the dogs start barking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cop cars are parked in front of a beige Calabassas McMans with a Lexus in the driveway. Chloe, in sweats, is led ou handcuffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marc is being questioned by detectives in a small room. H has photos of the other kids in front of him.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: MARC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We knew he was out of town through the internet, you'd google his name and see "Orlando Bloom is shooting a movie, he's with Miranda Kerr in New York." We walked in, it was unlocked, there was no alarm. DETECTIVE (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door was unlocked? MARC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I've never even broken a window. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you find the Rolexes? MARC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We found a safe at the bottom of a closet with the Rolexes and like five thousand dollars...I'll give everything back that I still have, and I'll find a way to repay them, I'm really sorry about what I did. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you know Rebecca was leaving the state? MARC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just thought she was going to stay at her dad's cause she wasn't getting along with her mom and step dad. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't know she was crossing state lines with stolen property, and leaving you holding the bag? MARC (Sad and betrayed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought she was just visiting her dad.

dialogues.speaker: INT. MARC'S MOM'S CAR- DAY
dialogues.text: Debbie is driving him home in silence. Marc looks out the window taking it all in, thinking about Rebecca and how i all over. A song comes on the radio that we heard earlier when they were having fun together, he holds back tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see over Marc's shoulder to his computer screen as he to Rebecca's Facebook page. What we've seen earlier as a page full of pictures and messages is now blank, with only Rebecca's ID photo and a icon of a lock with the message: Rebecca only shares some information publicly. If you know Rebecca, add her as a friend or send her a message.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see police cars approach a small house in the desert. Police knock on the door, and Rebecca opens it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a warrant to search the premises. Are you Rebecca Ahn? REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. The detective reads Rebecca her Miranda rights. She is calm and collected. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you understand your rights? REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Blue - 03/16/12           76.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know why we're at your home serving a search warrant? REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why do you think we're here? REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My friend Marc was arrested and he                  * called me from jail and told me the police had done a search warrant at his home. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know why? REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been watching TMZ and they've been saying I'm a `person of interest' in these burglaries. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Were you involved in any of the burglaries to these celebrities? REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I wasn't. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there going to be any property from any of those burglaries in this residence? REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you been in any of the celebrity's homes that have been burglarized? REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could any of your fingerprints of DNA be found in any of the victim's homes?

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some police look through Rebecca's room, her closet. They check a label and hold up some items of clothes they been looking for. CLOSE UP: they open a box and find the Paris Hilton nude photos from the safe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The police enter the living room with the found items and address the detective. POLICE OFFICER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've located a jacket and jeans that match the description by Lohan, and personal photographs of Paris Hilton. Rebecca's face goes white, and she loses her composure. REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I tell you where everything is, would you let me go? Hypothetically let's say I may know where this property is located and who has it, how could that help me? DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The detectives on this case are trying to recover hundreds of thousands of dollars worth of property for the victims and I'm sure they would say if your cooperation helped them locate it. REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to help you out, but I don't want to do anything without talking to my attorney. As the police continue to search, a box is open on the co table with pot and a pipe.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this your marijuana? REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I have a prescription for it and bought it in California. The police pack it up with other evidence. DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're being arrested for stolen property and L.A.P.D. detectives will be filing charges in their jurisdiction for burglary. They handcuff her and escort her out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rebecca is being questioned by the L.A. Detective in a sm room. REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you speak to any of the victims? DETECTIVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've spoken to all of the Victims. Rebecca's eyes light up. REBECCA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?! What did Lindsay say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MUG SHOTS: Flashes pop and we cut to each mug shot: Rebec Marc, Nicki, Chloe, Rob.

dialogues.speaker: 122A TMZ FOOTAGE ON T.V.
dialogues.text: We see Facebook party photos of Rebecca and the others.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: TV REPORTER (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rebecca Ahn, thought to be the ringleader was arrested, and awaits her hearing with the other members. Stay tuned for the latest on the Bling Ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paparazzi and video cameras surround Nicki and her sister they rush to get in their car. Harsh video camera lights shine in their faces in the darkness. MALE TMZ REPORTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you think you'll do in jail? She keeps moving, with her hood up and sunglasses on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god! LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is crazy. Laurie drives them away in her black S.U.V.

dialogues.speaker: INTERNET VIDEO CLIP
dialogues.text: A low-res video camera shows Lindsay Lohan get out of a b S.U.V and approach a courthouse in a tight white dress an big sunglasses as she passes a row of photographers. She looks like she's at a premier. Title: Actress Lindsay Lohan arrives at an LA court house after being charged with felony grand theft over a neckla

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicki is trying on court looks for Sam. She has on a Pete Pan collared shirt, mini skirt and heels, with her hair u a bun, she turns from the mirror to Sam. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does this look conservative, is this good?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Blue - 03/16/12              80.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you like a secretary-style hooker. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut Up.                                                * She changes her skirt to a little bit longer one. NICKI (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about this? SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's better...you need lower heels. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Yeah, where are my kitten heels...bitch, you're so fucking lucky you weren't on that video... SAM (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, that sucks. LAURIE (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicki!

dialogues.speaker: INT. NICKI'S HOUSE- DAY
dialogues.text: Laurie calls up to Nicki, the Yorkie barks at the door. LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicki! Kate from Vanity Fair is here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laurie sits next to Nicki as she speaks to KATE, a polish journalist from N.Y. A tape recorder sits in front of Nic Nicki's two lawyers, SHANNON a brunette in her early 40's a suit and pearls and ADAM, middle-aged lawyer-type, sit them. KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do your parents do?

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My mom does a lot of things, she's a minister, she's been a masseuse, she's an energy healer...My dad is a director of photography on T.V. shows, he's been in the industry forever.... KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And how is Sam related? NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've adopted her, we met in ballet class when we were little. LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was friends with her mother-- NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom, this is my interview. I met her when my parents divorced. Now she lives with us, my mom's home schooled us all for a while. LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The philosophy of `The Secret', it's based on the law of attraction, but my great- grandmother and grandmother both studied this philosophy. It's man's relationship to the Divine, that's what energy science means. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since I was young I learned about every religion. KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, Sam was in your ballet class, did she have parents? NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She had a dysfunctional background, we both did... LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I met her mom-- NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I talk please?! The reason we related so well is my dad is a recovering alcoholic and Sam's mom is..

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A practicing... NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A practicing drug addict and alcoholic and our moms became best friends and... LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then she went off the deep end, she was on the verge-- NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please! I told you that if you're going to be here you had to be quiet! That's why I didn't want you here because you talk! KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, basically you took her in. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, we took her in about 6 years ago. SHANNON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But let's get back to Nicki. KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So Adam here told me you do charity work. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, we do a lot of stuff through our church, it's Agape Church. LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the religious science philosophy being taught at Agape Church. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My other sister, Gabby is on a trip with them now helping build homes. And they do a yearly trip to Africa where they build wells and schools for kids. KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which country?

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, I can't remember exactly which country... We do bake sales and feeding the homeless, that kind of stuff. KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ok, so it's a little bit of a disconnect with these positive pursuits and what's happening now. ADAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicki, I don't want you to answer that comment. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think that I'm a firm... I have a good statement to say. KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She can speak generally. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not gonna speak about the case, what I was going to say is that I'm a firm believer in karma and I think this situation was attracted into my life as a huge learning lesson for me to grow and expand as a spiritual human being. Nicki is getting emotional as she speaks, her voice quive NICKI (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think the universe chose a better person than me because from this it's not just affecting me, it's affecting the media and everyone and I think I'm meant to bring truth to all this....I believe that I am an old soul. LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, she is. SHANNON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have gotten to know Nicki and her family and we feel Nicki is an extremely focused, honest person who has a lot to provide to the community. (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: SHANNON (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we agree that there hasn't been a disconnect, that there were circumstances that happened but Nicki herself continued to stay on her plane despite the tumultuous experiences happening. KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's your goal or life plan if you have one? NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do, I think my journey is to be a leader and push for peace and for the health of our planet-- Nicki starts to get teary eyed. SHANNON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nicki has expressed to me a lot of her humanitarianism. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's my main goal. God didn't give me these talents and what I look like to sit around and just be a model or famous. I want to do something people notice, that's why I'm studying business, so I can be a leader and take a stand for people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over Kate's shoulder, we see Marc speaking into her tape recorder, with his lawyer at his side. MARC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I met Rebecca in school after I moved back and went to Indian Hills, I went there because I had a lot of absences. I didn't want to go to school, I had a lot of self- loathing and anxiety issues, I felt that I was ugly... KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not ugly.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: MARC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know I'm not ugly, but I never thought I was an A-list looking guy.I Went to Indian Hills to learn and be with my peers, I felt so self-conscious I didn't look as good as everyone else. KATE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now you're a star. Marc laughs. MARC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On my Facebook page recently I had 800 friends requests, I accepted them all, I didn't even look at them, then I noticed someone had created a fan page for me. If it had been for something I had done to help the community or benefit something I'd love it, but it's just kind of awkward for me that these people are loving me for something that's looked down on in society... It's kinda showing that America has some sick fascination with a Bonnie and Clyde kind of thing.

dialogues.speaker: 128A FOOTAGE ON TV
dialogues.text: ON T.V. / Headline: Hollywood's "Burglar Bunch" allegedly targeted A-list stars. TV REPORTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After months of break-ins to the Hollywood homes of celebrities including Lindsay Lohan and Paris Hilton, police say they have finally cracked the case. Could a group of Tinsel Town teens be behind a multi-million dollar heist? Mike Van Freen has the details. We see a montage of the kids, and the victim's homes and celebrities on the red carpet.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: REPORTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could these teenagers be at the center of a celebrity crime spree? Police say they have stolen millions in cash, art and jewelry from the mansions of Orlando Bloom, Lindsay Lohan, Paris Hilton and countless other stars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a sunny L.A. day. Laurie, Nicki, Sam and Emily get out of their black S.U.V dressed for court. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I have a 5 mg adderal. Laurie hands her a pill from her purse, as they stop to d quick prayer on their way. LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just remember what we went over with Shannon, they can't prove you were in any of those houses. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, mom. Laurie smooths her skirt, as she stands straight in high heels. They take hands and bow their heads. NICKI (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know right here and right now there is one mind, one power and one presence. EMILY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom, shouldn't we go?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop what? NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop talking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revised Blue - 03/16/12              87.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: LAURIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's praying. NICKI

dialogues.text: Nicki, in full hair and make-up sits in front of a draped curtain back drop talking to an E journalist. INTERVIEWER

dialogues.text: We're here with Nicki Moore, who just served 30 days for her involvement in the Bling Ring, and shared a cell block with one of the victims- Lindsay Lohan. There were reports that Lindsay was crying, with you being next to her, did you actually hear any of this? NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could hear her crying the first day, which is hard when you're trying to be strong, I just tried to really keep to myself..., I just tried to get through the day , the days are so long you're woken up at 5:30. INTERVIEWER

dialogues.text: And how'd she look? NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Were you nervous you were next to her because you were accused of being a part of that group that allegedly robbed her house. NICKI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, it was hard for me there were tabloids and on T.V.s in there people were watching the story and they were showing the surveillance video and stuff... and little do people know that when that video came out I was actually in contact with her manager to tell her who I believed the people were who robbed her house... and eventually when I'm able to tell my story people will know the truth. INTERVIEWER
